description: Rubbish. It uses X11, is old, doesn't work, and WHO USES ANALOG TV? Kodi with the addon called sports-devil is much better. you can use ShadowNet in that and get live tv. Exodus (another Kodi addon) gives you great TV shows and Movies!
summary: Rubbish - just use Kodi and some add-ons instead
